title: 820 3787, 3 beeps
message:
Hey, 

No liquid or components knock off! 

when i plug the charger the motherboard beep 3x! 

Already unplug all connectors trackpad, keyboard, etc. Same history no changes. 

any ideas ? Can't find nothing related on posts... 

thanks

title: 820 3787, 3 beeps
message:
RAM error.
You can try to reflow ALL RAM chips, but no warranty at all.
Could be broken solder under CPU, or any RAM chip.
Broken trace is also possible.

title: 820 3787, 3 beeps
message:
OK, 

I Already moved the ram chips one by one with flux and the machine come to life. Let's see how much time it is during! Thanks
